metadata.title: CVE-2021-3200 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in libsolv 2020-12-13 via the Solver *testcase_read(Pool *pool, FILE *fp, const char *testcase, Queue *job, char**resultp, int *resultflagsp function at src/testcase.c: line 2334, whichcould cause a denial of service

criterions.comment: libsolv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
